abstract: ABC News television special interview with Bruce Jenner, former Olympic gold medalist and reality star who is transitioning from male to female, draws over 16.8 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Jenner appeared in a special edition of ABC’s “20/20” news program, which usually draws about 6.8 million viewers.

headline.main: Bruce Jenner’s Transgender Announcement Draws 16.8 Million on ABC News
headline.print_headline: Jenner Interview Draws 16.8 Million on ABC News

snippet: Mr. Jenner appeared in a special edition of ABC’s “20/20” news program, which usually draws about 6.8 million viewers.
